Holistic_Discover: Discover Practitioners in Your Preferred Field.2
Featured_Specialists_Because: Because Your Satisfaction is Our Drive2.
LOGINREGISTERContent: Login/Register & get full access to the website’s functionalities. Updates will be provided both via your personal area & by email2
ChooseContent: Choose the language in which you would like to have your consultation done. Choose holistic field & specialist of interest2.
BOOKContent: Book your spot on specialist’s profile. Types of consultations2
BOOKContentLi1: Written: you can write/voice message the specialist about a specific subject2
BOOKContentLi3: In-person: in-person consultation.Check where the specialist is consulting2
BOOKContentLi3P: Modes can be SHORT (exploratory contact), COMPLETE (full session) & CYCLE (a pack of complete sessions bookable within 3 months from payment)2
PAYONLINEContent: Pay online, by paypal or card systems2
LEAVEAREVIEWContent: Leave a review about the consultation. This step is strongly recommended to support our community choose their specialists wisely. Thanks for your collaboration2
CONSULTContentLi1: Written: you will get a written/voice answer to your query (by 7 days time).2
CONSULTContentLi2: Video: you will get the link to connect at the booked time.2
CONSULTContentLi3: In-person: exact location may be provided privately depending on the specialist.2
CONSULTContentLiP: * Cancellations: a full money refund is available up to 24 hrs before consultation (21% charge after this time). In case of net issues, please rebook the session or contact the specialist2
AnysuggestionContent: Tell us how to improve, suggest us your favourite health professionals (or inform them about MedAloha) & get in touch with us for any other need.2
NewsletterContent: Sign up for our Dose of Inspiration2
